QuestData.Title: The Rider's Bind
QuestData.Description: Have you seen the young serpents in the training yard?$B$BThe littles ones tend to be mischievous, and some of them ran off to play before the training session.$B$BThe Mistress will get angry if she discovers they're missing.$B$BWould you go find them and bring them back to me? I don't want them to get into trouble.$B$BThey like to play out in the open, so look for them in courtyards and around the spires.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope they didn't give you too much trouble.
QuestData.RewardText: You found them and brought them all back!$B$BThey've really taken a liking to you.$B$BThank you so much!
